abstract: Carl C. Icahn made a new hostile offer for Lions Gate Entertainment, but he cut his bid to $6.50 a share from $7.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn made a new hostile offer for Lions Gate Entertainment, but he cut his bid to $6.50 a share from $7.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn is back on the prowl for Lions Gate Entertainment, but this time he is offering less money for the movie studio than he did before.

headline.main: Icahn Makes Another Run at Lions Gate
